login.enterWorkEmailDescription: Isa email address yako yebasa kana yekuchikoro. Tichakuendesa otomatiki kune peji rekupinda resangano rako.
login.ssoProvidersInfo: Inoshanda neMicrosoft Azure AD, Okta, Google Workspace, nevamwe vanopa ruzivo rwekuti ndiani anoshandiswa nemakambani, mayunivhesiti, nezvikoro.
login.oneAccountForAll: Akaunti imwe chete yekuongorora zviri mukati, kuronga nguva, nezvimwe.

contentGeneration.title: Kugadzira Zviri Mukati meAI
contentGeneration.subtitle: Gadzira zvemukati ipapo ipapo, ronga kugadzira otomatiki, kana kuona nhoroondo yako.
contentGeneration.generatePostSubtitle: Gadzira zvemukati zvinoshandisa AI ipapo ipapo
contentGeneration.tip: Zano: Ongorora uye gadzirisa zvirimo zvakagadzirwa kuti zvienderane nezwi rekambani yako. Unogona kuzvigadzirisa zvakare muContent Moderation.
contentGeneration.promotionalDisclosure: Kuzivisa kuchawedzerwa kuti zvienderane nemirairo yekushambadza
contentGeneration.noScheduled: Hapana mashoko akarongwa parizvino. Gadzira rimwe riri pamusoro apa!
contentGeneration.noHistory: Hapana zvemukati zvakagadzirwa parizvino. Tanga kugadzira!

contentModeration.originalReplaced: Zviri mukati mepakutanga zvakatsiviwa neshanduro yakanyorwazve

posts.title: Zvinyorwa Zvose
posts.subtitle: Ronga zviri mukati mako pamapuratifomu akasiyana-siyana

strategicProfiles.pageDescription: Gadzira maprofayiro emhando yezvigadzirwa zvine ruzivo uye uzvibatanidze kumaakaundi evanhu
strategicProfiles.alertTitle: MaProfiles eStrategic ndiwo maBrand Brains ako
strategicProfiles.alertDescription: Purogiramu yega yega ine ruzivo rwakasiyana, maitiro ekunyora, uye mazwi akakosha eSEO. Isa magwaro kuti uvake hwaro hweruzivo runotungamira kugadzirwa kwezvinyorwa zveAI. Batanidza maakaundi evanhu kuti uparidze zvakananga kubva pane imwe neimwe nhoroondo yeprofile.
strategicProfiles.defaultProfileDesc: Purofayi yako huru yakabatana nezvirongwa zveakaundi
strategicProfiles.personalDesc: Kune zita rako kana kuti izwi rako
strategicProfiles.contentLanguageHelper: Mutauro wezvinyorwa zvakagadzirwa neAI (isina chinhu = shandisa default kubva kuZvirongwa)
strategicProfiles.seoKeywordsHelper: Wedzera mazwi akakosha kuti ugadzirise zviri mukati mekutsvaga
strategicProfiles.supportedFormats: Inotsigirwa: PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Text, Markdown, CSV
strategicProfiles.profileNamePlaceholder: semuenzaniso, Rudzi rweKushambadzira, Blog reTekinoroji, Zvemunhu

bonusMetadata.title: Zvirongwa zveProfile Yepamusoro
bonusMetadata.targetAudiencePlaceholder: Tsanangura vateereri vako vaunoda (semuenzaniso, nyanzvi dzekushambadzira dzine makore 25-45 dzinofarira tekinoroji)
bonusMetadata.targetAudienceHelper: Inobatsira AI kugadzirisa matauriro nezviri mukati zvevateereri vako chaivo

strategicProfiles.selectSocialAccount: Sarudza account yesocial media yekubatanidza nayo
strategicProfiles.noSocialAccounts: Hapana maakaundi esocial akawanikwa. Batanidza maakaundi mu

toasts.addedKeywords: Mazwi akakosha akawedzerwa zvichienderana neprofile yako

strategicProfiles.confirmDeleteProfile: Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima purofayiro iyi here? Izvi zvinodzimawo magwaro ese eruzivo awakaisa.
strategicProfiles.confirmDeleteDoc: Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima gwaro iri here?

toasts.invalidFileTypeDesc: Ndapota isa faira rePDF, DOCX, TXT, MD, PNG, JPG, kana WEBP.

settings.title: Zvirongwa
settings.languageHelp: Sarudza mutauro waunoda wekushandisa pakushandisa interface uye mutauro wezviri mukati
settings.accountHelp: Pano unogona kushandura ruzivo rweakaundi yemushandisi
settings.changePasswordHelp: Pano unogona kugadzirisa password yako itsva

teamPage.subtitle: Ronga nhengo dzechikwata chako uye mvumo yavo
teamPage.inviteFirst: Koka nhengo yekutanga yechikwata chako kuti itange

inviteModal.title: Koka Nhengo yeChikwata
inviteModal.emailHelper: Nhengo ichagamuchira email ine link yekukoka
inviteModal.orShareLink: Kana kuti govera iyi link yekukoka:

roles.creator: Musiki
roles.creatorDesc: Unogona kugadzira nekugadzirisa zviri mukati, wotumira kuti zvibvumidzwe
roles.creatorOption: Musiki - Anogona kugadzira zvemukati, anoda mvumo
roles.managerDesc: Inogona kubvumidza/kuramba zviri mukati uye kuburitsa
roles.managerOption: Maneja - Anogona kubvumidza zviri mukati uye kuburitsa
roles.adminOption: Admin - Kupinda zvizere kusanganisira manejimendi yechikwata
roles.userDesc: Mushandisi akajairika ane kodzero dzakakwana dzekuburitsa

toasts.emailRequiredDesc: Ndapota isa email address yemuteveri wechikwata.

teamPage.confirmRemove: Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kubvisa {{name}} muchikwata?

roles.title: Kutarisira Basa
roles.subtitle: Gadzira uye gadzirisa mabasa akagadzirwa nemaoko nemvumo dzakagadzirwa nepakati
roles.noRoles: Hapana mabasa akagadzirwa nevamwe parizvino. Gadzira rimwe kuti utange.

createModal.title: Gadzira Basa Idzva
createModal.permissionsHint: Sarudza mvumo dzinofanira kuva nebasa iri. Mvumo dzine njodzi huru dzakaratidzwa.

deleteConfirm.title: Bvisa Basa
deleteConfirm.message: Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kubvisa basa rekuti "{{name}}"?
deleteConfirm.warning: Vashandisi ve{{count}} vane basa iri parizvino. Vacharasikirwa nemvumo dzese dzine chekuita nebasa iri.

featureDisabled.title: Chinhu Hachina Kubvumidzwa
featureDisabled.message: Mvumo dzegranular hadzisati dzabvumidzwa kubhizinesi rako. Bata maneja wako kuti agonese basa iri.

settings.universalDocsDescription: Aya ndiwo mitemo yako yekutevedzera mitemo (Level 2). Mirayiridzo iyi inoshanda kune ZVESE zvaunogadzira, zvese zvemunhu nekambani. Isa zvaunofarira, zvirambidzo, uye mitemo yemafashoni pano.
settings.personalComplianceInfo: Mitemo iyi inotariswa pamaprofayiro ako OSE. Kuti uwane mitemo yekambani, enda kuMagadzirirwo eMabhizinesi.
settings.reportsDescription: Dhawunirodha mishumo yakazara yekuongorora njodzi uye yekuongorora zviri mukati
settings.pdfReportDescription: Zvinosanganisira kuongorora njodzi, kuongorora kutevedzera mitemo, kunzwisisa tsika, uye kuongorora zviri mukati zvinotungamirirwa neLLM
settings.dangerZoneDescription: Bvisa zvachose account yako nedata rese rakabatana nayo
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Kana wangodzima account yako, hapana kudzokera shure. Data rako rese kusanganisira zvinyorwa, ongororo, zvirimo zvakarongwa, uye marongero zvichabviswa zvachose.
settings.noHistoryFound: Hapana nhoroondo yakawanikwa. Tanga kuongorora zviri mukati kuti uone zvauri kuita pano.
settings.purchaseCreditsDesc: Tenga mamwe makiredhiti kana kuti wedzera mari yako yekunyorera kuti uwane mamwe makiredhiti pamwedzi.
settings.choosePlanDesc: Sarudza hurongwa hunoenderana nezvaunoda. Makiredhiti asina kushandiswa anozoshandiswa mwedzi unouya!
settings.extraCreditsDesc: Tenga mamwe mapaketi echikwereti chero nguva. Makiredhiti aya haaperi uye anongowanikwa mwedzi wega wega!
settings.creditsAddedInstantly: Makiredhiti anowedzerwa ipapo ipapo uye haaperi. Anoenderera mberi kusvika kumwedzi unouya!
settings.unusedCreditsRollover: Makiredhiti asina kushandiswa anozoendeswa kumwedzi unotevera!

enterprise.title: Dashboard yeBhizinesi
enterprise.creator: Musiki
enterprise.createCompanyDesc: Gadzira kambani yekuvhura maficha echikwata, ruzivo rwakagovaniswa, uye mashandiro ekushanda pamwe chete mune zvemukati.
enterprise.becomeAdmin: Uchava Mutungamiriri weKambani ane simba rakazara.
enterprise.onlyAdminsCanManage: Vatongi vekambani chete ndivo vanogona kugadzirisa ruzivo rwekambani uye marongero echikwata. Bata maneja wako kana paine shanduko.
enterprise.createAsAdminNote: Semugadziri, uchava Mutungamiriri weKambani une mvumo yakazara yekutarisira timu neruzivo.
enterprise.knowledgeBaseDesc: Magwaro akaiswa pano anoshanda kune vese nhengo dzechikwata pane zvese zvavari. Mitemo iyi inonyanya kukosheswa uye inodarika marongero emunhu wega wega emushandisi uye eprofile.
enterprise.uploadCompanyDocsHint: Nhungamiro dzechiratidzo, mitemo yepamutemo, magwaro ekutevedzera mitemo, mitemo yezvenhau dzemagariro evanhu
enterprise.noCompanyDocs: Hapana magwaro ekambani akaiswa parizvino. Tanga nekurodha mirairo yerudzi rwako kana magwaro ekutevedzera mitemo.
enterprise.teamMembersDesc: Ronga nhengo dzechikwata chako nemabasa avo. Vatungamiriri vanogona kurodha magwaro ekambani uye kutarisira timu.
enterprise.leaveCompanyWarning: Siya kambani iyi. Kana uri iwe wega mutungamiriri, unofanira kutanga wasimudzira mumwe nhengo.
enterprise.confirmLeave: Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kuenda?
enterprise.loseAccessWarning: Ucharasikirwa neruzivo rwawakawana pamwe chete nechikwata chako.
enterprise.adminLeaveWarning: Semutariri, unofanira kusimudzira mumwe nhengo kuti ave mutariri usati waenda.
enterprise.enterEmailAddress: Ndapota isa kero yeemail yemunhu waunoda kukoka.

dashboard.title: Dashboard yeBhizinesi
dashboard.clickForDetails: Dzvanya mitsetse kuti uwane rumwe ruzivo
dashboard.scoreDescriptions: Zvichibva pakuongorora kweAI: Yakanaka (85-100), Yakanaka (75-84), Avhareji (60-74), Yakashata (40-59), Yakakosha (0-39)
dashboard.accessDeniedDesc: Vatongi vemabhizinesi chete ndivo vanogona kupinda papeji rino

analytics.pageDescription: Ruzivo rwakakwana rwepuratifomu uye zviyero (Admin Chete)
analytics.postingActivityDesc: Kugoverwa kwekutumira kwemaawa makumi maviri nemana
analytics.contentQualityDesc: Avhareji yemapoinzi pane zvese zviri mukati
analytics.scoreTrendsDesc: Zvose, Kutevedzera Mutemo & Mapoinzi etsika (mwedzi mitanhatu)
analytics.geographicDistributionDesc: Dzvanya pazviratidzo kuti uone kupatsanurwa kwevanhu nenyika
analytics.costAnalysisDesc: Mari yekugadzirisa AI uye kutevedza bhajeti

success.subtitle: Kunyoreswa kwako kwave kushanda
success.planActivated: Chirongwa chako che {{plan}} chave kushanda ikozvino

cancel.keepBenefits: Ucharamba uine mukana wekushandisa kusvika nguva yako yekubhadhara yapera

errors.networkError: Chikanganiso chenetwork. Ndapota tarisai kubatana kwenyu.

scheduledPosts.pendingApprovalDesc: Zvinyorwa zvakatumirwa nenhengo dzechikwata zvakamirira ongororo yenyu.
scheduledPosts.approvedReadyDesc: Zvinyorwa zvakatenderwa zvagadzirira kurongwa kana kuburitswa.
scheduledPosts.scheduledPostsDesc: Zvinyorwa zvakagadzirira kuburitswa panguva yazvo yakarongwa.
scheduledPosts.scheduledPromptsDesc: Zvinokurudzirwa zvakarongerwa kugadzirwa kwezviri mukati otomatiki.
scheduledPosts.autoPostToSocial: Tumira otomatiki kumasocial media mushure mekuzvarwa
scheduledPosts.rejectionPlaceholder: Ndapota ipai mhinduro dzinovaka muchitsanangura kuti sei chinyorwa ichi chichifanira kugadziriswa...
scheduledPosts.rejectionFeedbackNote: Mhinduro iyi ichatumirwa kumugadziri kuti imubatsire kuvandudza chinyorwa.

toasts.postReturnedDesc: Chinyorwa ichi chadzoserwa kumugadziri pamwe nemhinduro yenyu.

scheduledPosts.confirmCancel: Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kukanzura chinyorwa ichi chakarongwa?
scheduledPosts.confirmDeletePrompt: Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kudzima chikumbiro ichi chakarongwa?

allPosts.importTooltip: Tumira zvinyorwa zvekare kubva kumaakaundi ako emagariro evanhu akabatana uchishandisa Ayrshare
allPosts.connectSocialToView: Batanidza maakaundi evanhu muZvirongwa kuti uone
allPosts.createFirstPost: Gadzira chinyorwa chako chekutanga muchikamu cheKugadzira Zvemukati!

toasts.connectSocialAccountsDesc: Batanidza maakaundi ako esocial media muZvirongwa kuti uwiriranise zviyero zvekubatana.
toasts.connectSocialFirst: Ndapota batanidzai maakaundi enyu emagariro evanhu kutanga muZvirongwa > Maakaundi Emagariro Evanhu
toasts.ayrshareUpgradeRequired: Ayrshare Premium kana Business Plan inodiwa

allPosts.confirmReanalyze: Izvi zvichaongororazve zvese zvawakanyora. Unoenderera mberi here?
allPosts.confirmDelete: Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima chinyorwa ichi here?

documentation.title: Rubatsiro & Zvinyorwa
documentation.subtitle: Tsvaga gwara rekubatsira nezvinhu zvinokubatsira kuti uwane zvakawanda kubva muContentry. Sarudza gwara rinoenderana nebasa rako.

whatsNew.title: Chii Chitsva
whatsNew.description: Yakawana otomatiki zvichangobva kugadziriswa uye zvinhu zvitsva zvakawedzerwa pachikuva
whatsNew.subtitle: Yakaona otomatiki shanduko uye zvigadziriso zvepuratifomu

adminGuide.title: Gwaro reMutungamiriri
adminGuide.description: Gwaro rakakwana revatungamiriri vepuratifomu. Dzidza maitiro ekutarisira vashandisi, kutarisa ongororo, uye kugadzirisa marongero esystem.

enterpriseGuide.title: Gwaro reBhizinesi
enterpriseGuide.description: Gwaro revatungamiriri vekambani. Dzidzai kutarisira timu yenyu, kugadzira ruzivo, uye kubata kubvumidzwa kwezvinyorwa.

userGuide.title: Gwaro Rekushandisa
userGuide.description: Zvese zvaunoda kuti ugadzire, uongorore, uye ubudise zviri mukati. Zvakakwana kune vanogadzira zviri mukati nevashambadziri.

overview.intro: Semutariri wepuratifomu, une mukana wekushandisa maturusi akakwana ekutarisa nekugadzirisa puratifomu yese yeContentry. Gwaro iri richakubatsira kunzwisisa kugona kwako kwekutonga.
overview.dashboardDesc: Dashboard yeAdmin inopa maonero akanaka ezviitiko zvepuratifomu uye hutano.
overview.feature3: Zviyero zvehutano hwehurongwa uye mashandiro ahwo
overview.tip: Shanyira Admin Dashboard nguva nenguva kuti ugare uine ruzivo nezvemafambiro ari kuita puratifomu uye kuti uone matambudziko anogona kuitika nekukurumidza.

userManagement.intro: Kutarisira vashandisi ibasa guru rekutonga rinokutendera kuti utarisire vashandisi vese nemabhizinesi ari papuratifomu.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Enda kuchikamu cheUser Management kuti uone, utsvage, uye utonge vashandisi vese vepuratifomu.
userManagement.feature1: Tsvaga uye sefa vashandisi nezita, email, kana basa
userManagement.feature2: Ona mapurofayiro evashandisi ane ruzivo rwakadzama uye nhoroondo yezviitiko
userManagement.feature4: Dzima kana kudzima maakaundi evashandisi kana zvichidikanwa
userManagement.rolesDesc: Contentry ine mabasa matatu makuru evashandisi:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Kupinda kwakazara papuratifomu ine kugona kwekugadzirisa sisitimu
userManagement.role2: Admin weMabhizinesi: Anotarisira timu yekambani yavo uye marongero ayo
userManagement.role3: Mushandisi: Zvinhu zvekugadzira nekuongorora zvirimo zvakajairika
userManagement.warning: Gara uchiongorora zvazvinoitika usati wachinja mabasa evashandisi kana kudzima maakaundi. Izvi zvinogona kukanganisa mashandiro echikwata.

analytics.intro: Analytics inopa ruzivo rwakadzama pamusoro pekushandiswa kuri kuitwa puratifomu iyi kumabhizinesi ese nevashandisi.
analytics.metric1: Vashandisi vese vari kushanda uye mafambiro ekukura
analytics.metric2: Kugadzirwa kwezviri mukati uye huwandu hwekuongorora
analytics.metric5: Kutevedzera mitemo uye mamakisi enjodzi mumakambani ese
analytics.tip: Tumira mishumo yekuongorora yehurukuro dzevane chekuita nechirongwa uchishandisa chikamu cheDownload Report.

financials.intro: Chikamu cheFinancial Overview chinopa ruzivo rwakadzama nezvemari inowanikwa papuratifomu uye metrics dzekunyorera.
financials.revenueDesc: Tarisa hutano hwemari uye mafambiro ekubhadhara mumakambani ese.

systemConfig.intro: Kugadziriswa kwesystem kunokutendera kuti ugone kugadzirisa marongero uye kubatanidzwa kwepuratifomu yese.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Gadzirisa uye tarisa kubatanidzwa kwevamwe vanhu:
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API yekuburitsa nhau pasocial media
systemConfig.integration2: Masevhisi eAI ekugadzira nekuongorora zviri mukati
systemConfig.tip: Gara uchiyedza kubatanidzwa munzvimbo yakatarwa usati wachinja marongero ekugadzira.

gettingStarted.intro: Tinokugamuchirai kuContentry! Semutariri weMakambani, une maturusi ekutarisira timu yako, kugadza gwara rezvinyorwa, uye kuona kuti brand yako inoshanda zvakanaka.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Tevedza matanho aya kuti ugadzire account yako yebhizinesi:
gettingStarted.step1: Enda kuZvirongwa > Bhizinesi kuti uwane dashboard yekambani yako
gettingStarted.step2: Isa nhungamiro nemitemo yekambani yako kuKnowledge Base
gettingStarted.step3: Koka nhengo dzechikwata chako uye uvape mabasa akakodzera
gettingStarted.step4: Gadzirisa mafambisirwo ebasa ekubvumidza kuti zviongororwe zviri mukati
gettingStarted.tip: Pedzisa hurongwa hwako hweKnowledge Base usati wakoka nhengo dzechikwata kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti vanokwanisa kuwana gwara remhando kubva pazuva rekutanga.

teamManagement.intro: Kutarisira timu zvakanaka kunoita kuti pave nekushandira pamwe kwakanaka uye kutonga kwakakodzera kwekupinda mukati mesangano renyu.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Wedzera nhengo itsva kuchikwata chebhizinesi rako:
teamManagement.feature2: Sarudza basa ravo (Musiki, Maneja, kana Mutungamiriri)
teamManagement.feature3: Wedzera meseji yako wega kune kukokwa
teamManagement.role1: Musiki: Anogona kugadzira nekutumira zviri mukati kuti zvibvumidzwe
teamManagement.role2: Maneja: Anogona kubvumidza/kuramba zvemukati uye kutarisira vagadziri
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Kupinda zvizere mubhizinesi kusanganisira kubhadharisa uye marongero
teamManagement.tip: Makokero anopera mushure memazuva manomwe. Yeuchidzai nhengo dzechikwata kuti dzigamuchire makokero avo nekukasika.

knowledgeBase.intro: Knowledge Base ndiyo nzvimbo huru yekambani yenyu yekutevera nhungamiro dzemhando, marongero, uye mitemo yezvinyorwa. Magwaro akaiswa pano anopa ruzivo nezvezvinyorwa zvakagadzirwa neAI kune vese vari muchikwata.
knowledgeBase.docType1: Magwara emhando yebrand uye gwara rezwi
knowledgeBase.tip: Isa nhungamiro dzemhando yako inonyanya kukosha kutanga. Iyo AI inokoshesa magwaro ari mukambani Knowledge Base pane kurodha kwemunhu mumwe nemumwe.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Kufambiswa kwemabasa ekubvumidza kunoita kuti zvese zviri mukati zvienderane nezvinodiwa nekambani yako zvisati zvaburitswa.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Zviri mukati zvinoyerera kuburikidza nezvikamu izvi:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Musiki anogadzira kana kuongorora zviri mukati
approvalWorkflow.step2: Zviri mukati zvinotumirwa kuti zvibvumidzwe (kana zvichidikanwa)
approvalWorkflow.step4: Zviri mukati zvinotenderwa zvinogona kuburitswa kumasocial media platforms
approvalWorkflow.warning: Bvumira zvinodiwa zvekubvumidza muZvirongwa kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti zvese zvirimo zvaongororwa usati waburitsa.

billing.intro: Ronga kunyoreswa kwebhizinesi rako uye tarisa mashandisirwo echikwereti.
billing.feature1: Ruzivo rwechirongwa chemazuva ano uye kugoverwa kwechikwereti
billing.feature3: Nhoroondo ye invoice uye nzira dzekubhadhara

adminUsersPage.title: Kutarisira Mushandisi
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Ronga vashandisi vese vari papuratifomu
adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima mushandisi uyu here?

deleteModal.title: Bvisa Mushandisi
deleteModal.description: Izvi zvichabvisa zvachose mushandisi nedata rese rakabatana naro:

gettingStarted.intro: Tinokugamuchirai kuContentry! Gwaro iri richakubatsirai kugadzira zvinyorwa zvinokwezva uye zvinotevedzera mitemo muchishandisa maturusi anoshandisa AI.
gettingStarted.step3: Gadzira Hurongwa Hwakakosha hweBrand yako kana Mushandirapamwe
gettingStarted.step4: Gadzira chikamu chako chekutanga chezviri mukati
gettingStarted.tip: Tanga neStrategic Profile kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti zvese zviri mukati mako zvinoramba zvichiratidza matauriro akafanana uye meseji.

contentCreation.intro: Kugadzira zvinyorwa zvinoshandisa AI zveContentry zvinokubatsira kugadzira zvinyorwa zvinonakidza mumasekondi mashoma.
contentCreation.feature1: Isa musoro wenyaya kana chikumbiro chinotsanangura zvaunoda kutumira nezvazvo
contentCreation.feature2: Sarudza mapuratifomu ako aunoda kushandisa (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, nezvimwewo)
contentCreation.schedule1: Gadzirisa hurongwa hwekugadzira zvinyorwa zvinogara zvichiitika
contentCreation.schedule2: Sarudza mazuva nenguva chaiyo yekutumira otomatiki
contentCreation.schedule3: Bvumira kutumira otomatiki kana ongororo nemaoko usati waburitsa
contentCreation.tip: Shandisa bhokisi rekuti 'Zviri Mukushambadzira' paunenge uchigadzira zvinyorwa zvekushambadzira kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti ongororo yekutevedzera mitemo inotarisa nhungamiro dzekushambadzira.

analyzeContent.intro: Chikamu cheAnalyze Content chinoongorora zviri mukati mako kuti zvionekwe kuti zvinotevedzera mitemo here, kuti tsika dzako dzinoenderana sei, uye kuti zvinonyatsoenderana nerudzi rwekambani.
analyzeContent.step1: Enda kuKuongorora Zviri Mukati > Ongorora Zviri Mukati
analyzeContent.step2: Namira zviri mukati mako munzvimbo yekunyora
analyzeContent.step4: Dzvanya Ongorora kuti uwane mhinduro dzakadzama
analyzeContent.tip: Gara uchiongorora zviri mukati usati wazvitumira kumapuratifomu ekunze, kunyanya kumakampeni akananga kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana.

strategicProfiles.intro: MaStrategic Profiles anotsanangura mamiriro ezvinhu, matauriro, uye nhungamiro dzekugadzira nekuongorora zviri mukati.
strategicProfiles.feature1: Tsanangura vateereri vakanangana neprofile uye chinangwa chayo
strategicProfiles.feature3: Isa magwaro nemirairo zvinoenderana neprofile yako
strategicProfiles.feature4: Gadzirisa matauriro akajairika uye magadzirirwo emhando
strategicProfiles.tip: Gadzira maProfiles akasiyana eStrategic emakampeni akasiyana, mabrandi, kana misika yemudunhu.

socialAccounts.intro: Batanidza maakaundi ako esocial media kuti ubudise zvirimo zvakananga kubva kuContentry.
socialAccounts.warning: Chengetedza masocial account ako achigadziriswa. Matokeni apera anogona kudzivirira kuti zvinyorwa zvakarongwa zvisaburitswe.

approvalProcess.intro: Kana bhizinesi rako riine mvumo yekushanda, zviri mukati zvinofanira kuongororwa zvisati zvaburitswa.
approvalProcess.step1: Gadzira kana kuongorora zviri mukati mako
approvalProcess.step2: Dzvanya 'Tumira Kuti Ubvumidzwe' kuti utumire kune maneja wako
approvalProcess.step3: Tevedzera mamiriro ekubvumidzwa mumutsara wekubvumidzwa wakamirira
approvalProcess.tip: Wedzera manotsi paunenge uchitumira zvemukati kuti upe vanoongorora ruzivo nezvesarudzo dzako dzekugadzira.

aboutGuide.title: Nezve & Maitiro Akanakisisa
aboutGuide.description: Dzidza kuti Contentry inobatsira sei uye tsvaga nzira dzakanakisisa dzekuvandudza kugadzirwa kwezvinyorwa zvako, zvibvumirano zvema brand, uye ma profiles evanopa simba.

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry ipuratifomu yeruzivo rwezvemukati inotsigirwa neAI yakagadzirirwa kubatsira vagadziri vezvemukati, vatengesi, uye mabhizinesi kugadzira, kuongorora, uye kuburitsa zvemukati zvinoenderana nehukuru. Ungave uri munhu ane simba kana kuti uri chikamu chechikwata chikuru chekushambadzira, Contentry inoita kuti mafambiro ezvemukati ako ave nyore.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: Tinotenda mukupa simba vagadziri nematurusi akangwara anova nechokwadi chekuti zvese zviri mukati zvinoenderana nerudzi rwekambani, zvinoenderana netsika, uye zvinoenderana nemirairo yepuratifomu.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: Kugadzirwa kwezvinyorwa zvinoshandisa AI zvinoenderana nezwi rekambani yako
whatIsContentry.benefit3: Kuongorora kunzwisiswa kwetsika kune vateereri vepasi rose
whatIsContentry.tip: Kugutsikana kunobatanidza simba reAI nekutarisira kwevanhu kuti vape zvemukati zvinofadza vateereri vako uku vachiramba vachitevedzera mitemo.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry inopa zvishandiso zvakakwana zvekutarisira hupenyu hwese hwezvinyorwa zvako:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Gadzira zvemukati zvemhando yepamusoro zvakagadzirirwa brand yako nevateereri:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Kugadzira zvemukati papuratifomu dzakawanda (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: Kugadzira mifananidzo yeAI kuti ienderane nezvawakanyora
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Iva nechokwadi chekuti zviri mukati mako zvinozadzisa zvese zvinodiwa usati waburitsa:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Kuongorora kwekutevedzera mitemo otomatiki kunoenderana nemitemo yekambani
keyFeatures.tip: Shandisa Strategic Profiles kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti brand inowirirana mune zvese zvakagadzirwa.

bestPractices.intro: Kutevedzera nzira idzi dzakanakisa kuchakubatsira kuti uwane zvakawanda kubva muContentry uye kugadzira zvirimo zvinoshanda zvakanaka:
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Kushanda zvakanaka kwemabasa nguva dzose kunovimbisa kunaka uye kushanda zvakanaka:
bestPractices.workflow1: Tanga nekugadzira Strategic Profile yako uchishandisa nhungamiro dzebrand
bestPractices.workflow2: Gadzira zvemukati uchifunga nezvepuratifomu chaiyo nevateereri
bestPractices.workflow3: Gara uchiongorora zviri mukati usati waburitsa kune mamwe mapuratifomu
bestPractices.workflow4: Shandisa maitiro ekuronga kuti urambe uchienderera mberi nekutumira nguva dzose
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Kugara uchigadzira zita rekambani kunoita kuti vanhu vavimbe uye vazivikanwe:
bestPractices.consistency1: Isa gwara remhando yebhizinesi rako kuKnowledge Base
bestPractices.consistency2: Shandisa Strategic Profile imwecheteyo pamishandirapamwe yakafanana
bestPractices.consistency3: Ongorora zvirimo zvakagadzirwa neAI kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti zvinoenderana nezwi rako
bestPractices.warning: Gara uchiongorora zvinyorwa zvakagadzirwa neAI usati wazviburitsa. Kunyange zvazvo AI yedu ine simba, kutarisirwa kwevanhu kunoita kuti pave nemigumisiro yakanaka.

optimizeContent.intro: Kugadzira zvemukati zvakanaka ingori mavambo chete. Heino maitiro ekugadzirisa kuti vanhu vabatane zvakanyanya:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Puratifomu yega yega ine zvinodiwa zvakasiyana uye zvinotarisirwa nevateereri:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: Tarisa pane ruzivo rwehunyanzvi, shandisa mazwi akakosha eindasitiri, uye mafomu anogamuchirwa kwenguva refu
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Tumira mameseji mapfupi, shandisa ma hashtag zvine hungwaru, taura nenhau dziri kufarirwa nevanhu vakawanda
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook: Zviri mukati zvinoonekwa zvinoshanda zvakanaka, zvinokurudzira kubatanidzwa kwenharaunda
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Mifananidzo yepamusoro-soro inokosha, shandisa ma hashtag akakodzera, Nhau dzekubatanidzwa
optimizeContent.engagement1: Tumira nguva dzose panguva dzakakodzera vateereri vako
optimizeContent.engagement2: Shandisa zvinokurudzira kuti vanhu vaite chimwe chinhu muzvinyorwa zvako
optimizeContent.engagement3: Pindura kune zvataurwa uye taurirana nenharaunda yako
optimizeContent.engagement4: Tevedzera ongororo kuti unzwisise kuti zvirimo zvinoshanda zvakanaka
optimizeContent.tip: Shandisa chinhu cheContentry chekugadzirisa hurongwa hwezvinhu kuti unyore panguva dzakakodzera pasina kushandisa maoko.

brandDeals.intro: Kubatana kwemakambani kunogona kuva nzira huru yekuwana mari. Heino maitiro ekuvandudza maitiro ako:
brandDeals.prep1: Chengetedza portfolio yezvinyorwa zvehunyanzvi uye zvinoenderana
brandDeals.prep2: Tevedzera uye ratidza zviyero zvako zvekubatanidzwa
brandDeals.prep3: Gadzira kit yezvenhau ine huwandu hwevanhu vako uye kusvika kwako
brandDeals.prep4: Shandisa Contentry kugadzira mienzaniso yezvinyorwa zvemhando yepamusoro
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Ita kuti zvikumbiro zvako zvionekwe zvakasiyana:
brandDeals.pitch1: Gadzirisa hurukuro yako zvichienderana netsika dzekambani uye vateereri vaunoda
brandDeals.pitch2: Ipa pfungwa dzezviri mukati chaidzo kwete mazano akajairika
brandDeals.pitch3: Isawo ongororo yekutevedzera mitemo kuti uratidze kuti zviri mukati mako zvinoenderana nemirairo
brandDeals.tip: Shandisai kuongorora kweContentry kwekutevedzera mitemo pakugadzira zvinyorwa zvinotsigirwa kuti muve nechokwadi chekuti zvinodiwa neFTC ne platform disclosure zvinosangana nazvo.

influencerProfiles.intro: Purogiramu Yako Yezvekuita (Strategic Profile) ndiyo hwaro hwehurongwa hwako hwezvemukati. Heino maitiro ekugadzirisa:
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Purogiramu yakagadzirwa zvakanaka inoita kuti zvive nyore kushandisa, zviri pa brand:
influencerProfiles.setup1: Tsanangura nzvimbo yako chaiyo uye vateereri vako zvakajeka
influencerProfiles.setup2: Gadza matauriro aunofarira uye maitiro ekunyora
influencerProfiles.setup3: Wedzera pfungwa dzetsika nedzenharaunda kune vateereri vako
influencerProfiles.setup4: Isa magwaro ekutarisa anotsanangura izwi rekambani yako
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Ramba uchivandudza profile yako kuti uwane mhedzisiro iri nani:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Ongorora zvirimo zvakagadzirwa uye gadzirisa marongero eprofayiro sezvinodiwa
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Gadzira mapurofayiri akawanda emakampeni akasiyana kana vateereri
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Chengetedza Ruzivo rwako ruchivandudzwa nemirairo yemhando yemazuva ano
influencerProfiles.tip: Ongorora Strategic Profile yako kota yega yega kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti inoratidza shanduko huru mubhizinesi rako uye vateereri vako.

workflowsGuide.title: Mafambiro Ebasa & Gwaro Rekuhwina Zvibodzwa
workflowsGuide.description: Dzidza mashandiro anoita sisitimu yekupa mamakisi uye unzwisise danho rega rega rebasa kubva pakuongorora zviri mukati kusvika pakubvumidzwa.

scoring.intro: Sisitimu yekupasa mapoinzi muContentry inopa mapoinzi akajeka, anoenderana nezvirango kuti ikubatsire kunzwisisa mashandiro anoita zviri mukati mako. Mapoinzi ese anotangira pa100 uye mapoinzi anobviswa nekuda kwekutyorwa kwemitemo kana matambudziko akawanikwa.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Chibodzwa chose musanganiswa wezvinhu zvese zvekuongorora, kubva pa0 kusvika ku100:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: Yakanaka kwazvo - Yagadzirira kuburitswa, zvemukati zvakagadziridzwa zvakanyanya
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Zvakanaka - Kuvandudzwa kudiki kunokurudzirwa usati waburitsa
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Inoda Kutariswa - Ongororo uye kugadziridzwa kunodiwa
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Yakaiswa mucherechedzo - Matambudziko akakosha, musaburitse kusvika agadziriswa
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Chibodzwa chose chinoshandisa adaptive weighting zvichienderana nenjodzi:
scoring.overallCalc4: Njodzi Yakakosha (Kutevedzera 40): Chibodzwa chose chakaomarara pa40 yepamusoro
scoring.componentsDesc: Chibodzwa chako chose chinoverengerwa kubva muzvikamu zvitatu zvakakosha uchishandisa sisitimu yakavakirwa pazvirango:
scoring.component1: Chiyero Chekutevedzera Mutemo: Chinotangira pa100, chinobvisa mapoinzi pakutyorwa kwemutemo kwakawanikwa
scoring.component2: Chiyero cheKunzwisisa Tsika: Avhareji yezvikamu zvitanhatu zvetsika zveHofstede
scoring.component3: Chiyero Chekururama: Chinotanga pa100, chinobvisa mapoinzi pakusava nekururama kana dambudziko rinowanikwa
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Chinyorwa chega chega chinotanga neCompliance Score ye100. Mapoinzi anobviswa pakutyorwa kwega kwega kwemutemo:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Kutyorwa Kwemutemo Kwakakosha (-60 pts): Kutyorwa kwemutemo weNDA, kuburitswa kwemashoko akavanzika  Njodzi yekubviswa kwemutemo nekukasika
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Kutyorwa kwemutemo kwakanyanya (-40 pts): Kushungurudzwa, rusarura, kutaura ruvengo  Njodzi yekumhan'arirwa kumatare edzimhosva
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Kutyorwa kwemutemo kwakanyanya (-25 pts): Kusaburitswa pachena kwekushambadzira, kutyorwa kwemutemo  Njodzi yefaindi/kumiswa kwemutemo
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Kutyora mutemo zvine mwero (-10 pts): Manzwi asina kukodzera, kutsauka kudiki kwenhungamiro  Kudzidziswa/yambiro
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Muenzaniso: #ad isipo (-25) + Dambudziko renzwi (-10) = Chibodzwa chekupedzisira che65
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Kutyorwa kwemitemo kwakawanda - chirango chega chega chinoshandiswa pamwe chete
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Kutyorwa kwemitemo kwakaongororwa: Ruzivo rwepachivande, Kushungurudzwa, Kutyorwa kwemutemo weNDA, Kusaburitswa pachena, Kutyorwa kwemutemo, Matauriro asina kukodzera
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Chibodzwa chetsika ndicho avhareji yezvikamu zvitanhatu zvepamutemo zveHofstede zvetsika (0-100 chimwe nechimwe):
scoring.culturalDim1: Kureba Nesimba: Kurongeka, kuremekedza vane simba vs. kuenzana, matauriro asina kurongeka
scoring.culturalDim2: Kuzvimirira wega vs. Kubatana: Kutarisa 'Ini/Ini' vs. 'Isu/Isu' munharaunda
scoring.culturalDim3: Hunhu hwevarume vs. Hukadzi: Mutauro wemakwikwi/wekusimbisa vs. wekushandira pamwe/wekubvumirana
scoring.culturalDim4: Kudzivirira Kusava Nechokwadi: Mitemo, kuchengetedzeka, kujekesa zvinhu zvikuru vs. kubuditsa pachena zvinhu zvisina kujeka
scoring.culturalDim5: Kudzidziswa Kwenguva Refu: Kutarisa mibairo yeramangwana vs. purofiti yenguva pfupi
scoring.culturalDim6: Kuzvifadza vs. Kuzvidzora: Kuva netariro/kunakidzwa vs. mutauro wakanyarara/unodzorwa
scoring.culturalRisk: Kana Cultural Score yadzikira pasi pe50, huremu hwe'Reputation Risk' hunoshandiswa kuchengetedza zita rako kune vateereri vepasi rose.
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Chinyorwa chega chega chinotanga neAccuracy Score ye100. Mapoinzi anobviswa pamatambudziko akawanikwa:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Kusarongeka kukuru/Mashoko Asiriwo (-40 pts): Zvichemo zvenhema, ruzivo rwenhema
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Chitubu Chisingavimbike (-20 pts): Zvikumbiro zvinobva kumasosi asina kuvimbika
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Chirevo Chisingavimbiswe (-10 pts): Mashoko asingakwanise kuongororwa kuti ndeechokwadi here
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Muenzaniso: Chirevo chenhema (-40) + Chitubu chisina kusimbiswa (-20) = Chibodzwa chekupedzisira che40
scoring.accuracyCalc: Nyaya dzakawanda dzakaunganidzwa - chirango chimwe nechimwe chinoshandiswa pamwe chete
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Zviri mukati zvinoratidzwa otomatiki zvichibva pane zvabuda muongororo:
scoring.flag1: Kufukidzwa Kwakanaka (Kwegirini): Zvibodzwa zviri pamusoro pe80 - zvagadzirira kuburitswa
scoring.flag2: Inoda Kutariswa (Yero): Mapoinzi 60-79 - kuvandudzwa kudiki kunokurudzirwa
scoring.flag3: Yakaiswa chiratidzo kuti iongororwe (Orange): Zvibodzwa 40-59 - ongororo inodiwa usati waburitsa
scoring.flag4: Matambudziko Akakosha (Tsvuku): Mapoinzi ari pasi pe40 - musaburitse pachena kusvika zvagadziriswa
scoring.disclosure1: Inoshambadza: Inoona kana zviri mukati zviri zvekushambadzira kana kuti zvinotsigirwa
scoring.disclosure2: Ane Kuzivisa: Kutarisa #ad chaiyo, #sponsored, kana partnership kuzivisa
scoring.disclosure3: Kutevedzera Mutemo weDunhu: Kunosimbisa zvinodiwa pakuzivisa pachena zveFTC (US), EU, neNorway
scoring.disclosure4: Kusaburitswa pachena kunokonzera kutyorwa kwakanyanya kwemutemo (-25 points) paCompliance Score
scoring.tip: Zvibodzwa zvinoverengerwa patsva pese pazvinoongororwa zviri mukati. Shandisa chinhu cheRewrite kuti uvandudze zviri mukati zvine zvibodzwa zvishoma uku uchichengetedza meseji yako.

analyze.intro: Nzira yekuongorora Zviri Mukati inokubatsira kuti uongorore zvirimo kuti uone kuti zvinotevedzwa sei, tsika, uye hunhu hwenyaya usati waburitsa.
analyze.stepsDesc: Tevedzera matanho aya kuti uongorore zviri mukati mako:
analyze.step1: Enda kuContent Intelligence > Ongorora Content tab
analyze.step2: Namira kana kunyora zviri mukati mako munzvimbo yekunyora
analyze.step3: Sarudza Strategic Profile kuti ushandise nhungamiro dzebrand yako
analyze.step4: Sarudza 'Gadzira mufananidzo unoperekedza' kana uchida kuti AI igadzire mufananidzo unooneka
analyze.type1: Kuongorora Kutevedzera Mutemo: Kunoongorora zviri mukati zvichipesana nemitemo nepuratifomu (FTC, GDPR)
analyze.type2: Kusanzwisisa Tsika: Kutsvaga zviri mukati zvinogona kugumbura kana kuti zvisina kukoshesa tsika
analyze.type3: Kusimbiswa Kwechokwadi: Kunoongorora zvirevo nechokwadi kuti zvakarurama here
analyze.type4: Kurongeka kweBrand: Kuenzanisa zviri mukati nemirairo yako yeStrategic Profile
analyze.tip: Shandisa bhatani rekuti 'Nyorazve' kuti uvandudze zviri mukati zviri pasi pe70 otomatiki. AI ichagadzirisa matambudziko akataurwa uku ichichengetedza meseji yako.

generate.intro: Nzira yekugadzira zvemukati inoshandisa AI kugadzira zvemukati zvitsva zvichienderana nemusoro wenyaya yako, zvinodiwa papuratifomu, uye nhungamiro dzemhando.
generate.step1: Enda kuContent Intelligence > Content Generation tab
generate.step2: Isa musoro wenyaya yako kana kuti tsanangura zvaunoda kugadzira
generate.step3: Sarudza puratifomu yako yaunoda uye matauriro ako
generate.step4: Sarudza Hurongwa Hwakarongeka hwekuti chifananidzo chirambe chakafanana
generate.step5: Dzvanya 'Gadzira' kuti ugadzire zvemukati zvinoshandisa AI
generate.optionsDesc: Gadzirisa zvemukati zvako zvakagadzirwa nesarudzo idzi:
generate.option1: Kusarudzwa kwePuratifomu: Sarudza puratifomu imwe chete kana dzakawanda (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Matauriro Ekunyora: Sarudza kubva kuNyanzvi, Zvakajairika, Zvinokurudzira, kana Zvinopa Ruzivo
generate.option3: Kureba Kwezviri Mukati: Gadzirisa kureba kwaunoda kuti zviri mukati mako zvivepo
generate.option4: Kugadzira Mifananidzo: Batidza kuti ugadzire mufananidzo unoenderana neAI
generate.tip: Zvemukati zvakagadzirwa zvinoongororwa otomatiki mushure mekugadzirwa. Ongorora mamakisi uye shandisa mabhatani emhinduro kuti uzvigadzirezve kana zvichidikanwa.

schedulePrompt.intro: Schedule Prompt inokutendera kuti ugadzire otomatiki kugadzira zvinyorwa zvinomhanya panguva dzakatarwa, zvichiita kuti karenda yako yezvinyorwa igare yakazara pasina kupindira nemaoko.
schedulePrompt.step1: Gadzira chikumbiro chako chekugadzira zvinyorwa nemusoro wenyaya uye zvaunofarira
schedulePrompt.step2: Gadza nguva yepurogiramu (zuva nezuva, vhiki nevhiki, kana mazuva chaiwo)
schedulePrompt.step3: Sarudza nguva iyo zvinyorwa zvinofanira kugadzirwa
schedulePrompt.step4: Bvumira 'Auto-analyze' kuti iite ongororo yezviri mukati zvakagadzirwa otomatiki
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Ramba uchitumira zvinhu nguva dzose pasina basa remaoko rezuva nezuva
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Gadzira rondedzero yezvinyorwa kuti zviongororwe uye zvibvumidzwe
schedulePrompt.tip: Zvikumbiro zvakarongwa zvinogadzira zvirimo mumadhirowa ako. Ongorora uye bvumidza usati waburitsa kuti uve nechokwadi chekuti zvine mhando.

schedulePost.intro: Ronga Kutumira kunokutendera kuti uronge zvinyorwa zvakatenderwa kuti zvibudiswe otomatiki panguva dzakakodzera pamapuratifomu ako esocial media.
schedulePost.step1: Kubva pane chero zviri mukati, tinya 'Ronga purogiramu' pachinzvimbo chekuti 'Publish Now'
schedulePost.step4: Simbisa uye wedzera kune yako yakarongwa queue
schedulePost.option1: Nguva Yakananga: Sarudza zuva nenguva chaiyo yekuburitsa
schedulePost.option2: Nguva Yakanakisisa: Rega AI ipe nguva dzakanakisa dzekutumira zvichibva padata rekubatana
schedulePost.option3: Mapuratifomu Akawanda: Ronga zvirimo zvakafanana pamapuratifomu akawanda panguva imwe chete
schedulePost.warning: Zvinyorwa zvakarongwa zvinoda kanenge kaaccount imwe chete yesocial media yakabatana. Batanidza maakaundi muZvirongwa > MaProfile eSocial.

approval.intro: Kufambiswa Kwebasa reKubvumidza kunovimbisa kunaka kwezvinyorwa nekukumbira kuti maneja aongorore zvisati zvaburitswa. Izvi zvakakosha zvikuru kumapoka emabhizinesi nemaindasitiri anotongwa nemutemo.
approval.processDesc: Mafambiro anoita zviri mukati mebasa rekubvumidza:
approval.step1: Musiki anotumira zviri mukati nekudzvanya 'Tumira Kuti Ubvumidzwe'
approval.step2: Zviri mukati zvinoonekwa mumutsara wekubvumidzwa kwemaneja
approval.step3: Maneja anoongorora zviri mukati, mamakisi, uye mhedzisiro yekuongorora
approval.step4: Maneja anotendera, anokumbira shanduko, kana kuramba zviri mukati
approval.status1: Chinyorwa: Zviri mukati zviri kugadziriswa, hazvisati zvatumirwa
approval.status2: Kumirira Kubvumidzwa: Yakatumirwa uye yakamirira kuongororwa kwemaneja
approval.status3: Zvatenderwa: Zvagadzirira kuburitswa kana kuronga nguva
approval.status4: Kugadziriswa kweZvinodiwa: Maneja akakumbira shanduko - tarisa mhinduro wozotumirazve
approval.tip: Wedzera manotsi paunenge uchitumira zvemukati kuti upe vanoongorora ruzivo nezvesarudzo dzako dzekugadzira. Izvi zvinoita kuti kubvumidzwa kukurumidze.

confirmDelete.title: Simbisa Kudzima
confirmDelete.userMessage: Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima mushandisi uyu here? Chiito ichi hachigone kudzoserwa shure.
confirmDelete.bulkMessage: Une chokwadi chekuti unoda kudzima vashandisi ve {{count}} here? Chiito ichi hachigone kudzoserwa shure.

confirmCancelSubscription.title: Dzima Kunyoresa
confirmCancelSubscription.message: Une chokwadi here kuti unoda kukanzura kunyoreswa kwemushandisi uyu? Vacharasikirwa nekuwana maficha epamusoro.

twoFactorAuth.title: Kusimbiswa Kwezvinhu Zviviri
twoFactorAuth.description: Wedzera imwe nhanho yekuchengetedzwa kuaccount yako
twoFactorAuth.setupInstructions: Skena iyi QR code uchishandisa app yako yekuvimbisa
twoFactorAuth.backupCodesDescription: Sevha makodhi aya munzvimbo yakachengeteka. Unogona kuashandisa kuti upinde muakaundi yako kana ukarasikirwa neauthenticator yako.

platformSelector.title: Mapuratifomu Akanangwa
platformSelector.aiWillOptimize: AI ichagadzirisa zviri mukati zvepuratifomu ye {{count}}
platformSelector.aiWillOptimizePlural: AI ichagadzirisa zviri mukati memapuratifomu e {{count}}

emptyState.createFirst: Gadzira chinyorwa chako chekutanga kuti utange

gdpr.cookieDescription: Tinoshandisa makuki kuti tivandudze ruzivo rwenyu rwekutsvaga ruzivo, tipe zvemukati zvakakunakirai, uye tiongorore traffic yedu. Nekudzvanya "Gamuchirai Zvese", munobvuma kushandiswa kwedu kwemakuki. Munogona kugadzirisa zvamunoda kana kuramba makuki asingakoshi.
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: Zvinodiwa pakusimbiswa, kuchengetedzeka, uye mashandiro ekutanga. Hazvigone kudzimwa.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: Tibatsirei kunzwisisa kuti vashanyi vanobatana sei nepuratifomu yedu kuti vavandudze masevhisi edu.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: Inoshandiswa kuendesa kushambadzira kwakagadzirirwa iwe pachako uye kuyera kushanda kwemushandirapamwe.
